name: Modern Gun Smoke
description:
Tribute to:

GUN SMOKE

(Nintendo cap com)

My version goes by name Modern Gun Smoke. Its first solo school project for my studies in Metropolia university of applied sciences.

Main goal in the game is to be a best gun slinger in all of Wild West.

You are a sheriff and you need to capture or defeat badguys. No matter dead or alive but preferred result is DEAD.

TRY and FIND OUT are you good enough to survive all the way and earn your place among the stars.

GAME IS STILL IN DEMO STAGE!

Code +++: Turo Väärti

Graphics: Karoliina Jaakkola, Elizabet Halatyan & Unity Assets Store

Music and SFX: Artlist.io
